mapper.insert: INSERT INTO documents (id, title, file_name, file_type, file_size, status, chunk_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{status}, #{chunkCount}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM documents WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update:
UPDATE documents
title = #{title}, status = #{status}, chunk_count = #{chunkCount}, error_message = #{errorMessage}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
